abstract: Luis Cartagena of Bronx, who pleaded guilty in April to second-degree murder in  2014 death of his infant nephew, is sentenced to 18 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Luis Cartagena pleaded guilty last month to fatally striking Joemill Greer, 2-months-old, while the boy was under his care.

headline.main: Bronx Man Gets 18 Years in Prison for Killing Baby Nephew
headline.print_headline: Prison for Man Who Killed His Baby Nephew

snippet: Luis Cartagena pleaded guilty last month to fatally striking Joemill Greer, 2-months-old, while the boy was under his care.
